meanings.definition: Resembling grass in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The grasslike plant swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The yard was filled with grasslike plants that added a natural touch.
meanings.sent3: The grasslike leaves seemed to be dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, soft and grasslike, flowed down her back.
meanings.sent5: The grasslike texture of the fabric made it feel like walking on a meadow.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to grass.
meanings.sent1: The grasslike texture of the carpet was comforting underfoot.
meanings.sent2: The salad had a fresh, grasslike taste that reminded me of summer.
meanings.sent3: The grasslike color of the walls made the room feel like a garden.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a soothing, grasslike quality that calmed everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The grasslike scent of the perfume brought back memories of picnics in the park.
